India is making significant progress in developing Multimodal Logistics Parks (MMLP)
to strengthen its transport and logistics infrastructure. These parks are being strategically developed in key locations
such as Chennai, Bengaluru, and Nagpur, under the government's Bharatmala Pariyojana initiative, aimed at improving logistics efficiency across the country.


MMLPs are designed as large cargo handling facilities
, covering at least 100 acres
and equipped with… See more

Apresentação
New Wave International Cargo is a 3PL logistics operator with its own assets and brokerage capabilities. We offer our customers solutions in all modes of transportation, including FTL, LTL, Ocean Freight, Drayage, and Air Freight.

  ·
In 2025, the International Maritime Organization (IMO) plans to take further critical steps in the fight against CO₂ emissions in maritime shipping. 
 A significant event will be the introduction of a global carbon pricing mechanism for greenhouse gas emissions, set to be approved in 2025. This will alter operational costs for shipping companies, as vessels will be required to pay for their CO₂ emissions, providing an additional incentive to invest in zero-emission fuels.

newwaveic
🇵🇱

Wiemy, że czekaliście 😄✨ Gotowi na kolejny wywiad z serii "Transport na piątkę"? 🚛⭐ Mamy dla Was coś specjalnego – przedstawiamy kolejny multitalent z NWIC, a jest nim Krzysztof Adamczyk! 🎤🌟

Krzysztof to prawdziwy mistrz w swojej dziedzinie, który codziennie inspiruje nas swoją wiedzą i zaangażowaniem. Przeczytajcie wywiad, aby dowiedzieć się więcej o jego pasjach, doświadczeniach i tym, co sprawia, że jest niezastąpioną częścią naszego zespołu. 🌍💪

Nie przegapcie okazji, aby poznać Krzysztofa lepiej 👉 Link do wywiadu w Bio!
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
🇺🇸

We know you've been waiting 😄✨ Ready for the next interview in our "Top-grade transport" series? 🚛⭐ We have something special for you – presenting another multitalented member of NWIC, Chris Adamczyk! 🎤🌟

Chris is a true master in his field, who inspires us every day with his knowledge and dedication. Read the interview to learn more about his passions, experiences, and what makes him an indispensable part of our team. 🌍💪

Don't miss the chance to get to know Chris better 👉 Link to the interview in our Bio!
Edited · 15 w
7 August
